entry.def: Goods such as food that are perishable go bad after quite a short length of time.

example.ex: ...perishable food like fruit, vegetables and meat...
example.tran: 水果、蔬菜、肉类等易变质的食品

example.ex: Raw eggs are highly perishable and must be chilled before and after cooking.
example.tran: 生鸡蛋非常容易变质，烹制前后必须冷藏。

Sentence.sentence: Of the produce that does appear in the supermarket, commonly used sales promotions frequently encourage customers to purchase excessive quantities which, in the case of perishable foodstuffs, inevitably generate wastage in the home.
